description:
Includes signs installed and maintained by the Seattle Department of Transportation within the public right of way. The inventory is maintained in SDOT’s Infor/Hansen Asset Management System, and displayed in GIS as point events along a block face.

To download the shapefile set or the kmz (compressed kml) right click on the file in the Attachment section and select Save As and select where you want it saved.

metadata.attribution: City of Seattle, Department of Transportation

name: Street Parking Signs
